channel.title: Ll Atlantis ll Witness the resurface!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i540.photobucket.com/albums/gg357/MisterPub/logo_zps2d76273b.png[/img][/center] [center][i]Witness the resurface![/i][/center]
[center]Website: www.atlantisrsps.elementfx.com (Domain name will be purchased within a week)[/center]
This server was created upon request of one of my Skype friends. I have worked pretty hard on it to be honest. Even if it was just bug fixes, moving objects, and changing names. I know some people will find interest in it without immediately turning it down because it's a "normal old PI". I want feedback of course, but I don't want to be completely shot down, so be generous. :p
[center]Here are some pictures showcasing the server.
[center][IMG]http://i540.photobucket.com/albums/gg357/MisterPub/customhomearea_zpsc4b27876.png[/img] Home Area! :D [IMG]http://i540.photobucket.com/albums/gg357/MisterPub/home2_zps532542fc.png[/img] Home Area! :D [IMG]http://i540.photobucket.com/albums/gg357/MisterPub/shops_zpse1a4a44d.png[/img] Shops & Customised Staff List! [IMG]http://i540.photobucket.com/albums/gg357/MisterPub/skills_zpsed5e6f88.png[/img] All Skills Working! PK Level [IMG]http://i540.photobucket.com/albums/gg357/MisterPub/teles_zps0770318b.png[/img][/center] Plethora of Tele's to get you around the server.[/center]
Once again, I know this isn't a lot, this is pretty much my first rodeo if you will. Give me feedback and let me know what you think. also... JOIN! One [i]Moderator[/i] and one [i]Administrator[/i] position open!

item.title: Ll Atlantis ll Witness the resurface!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’ve been in the position you’re in before and I went on to run an extremely successful server. I’ve told this to several people it’s not the content you have in the server, you don’t need unique content to gain players. I only know the very basics of java, and I mean proper basics. It’s all about the way the server is run, have trustworthy staff, have a smooth running server with little downtime, a smooth running server that doesn’t get taken offline every 10 minutes. Keep true to your players and don’t have secrets. Be as see-through as glass, they respect that. If they respect you they will stick by the server.

The best of luck to you.

Read full topic
item.source: Ll Atlantis ll Witness the resurface!
